answers.answer: I have been dizzy off and on my left arm feels week and sometimes painful not bad just noticeable and tingling in my palm sometimes my neck is painful up the side and my right arm yesterday felt like the circulation was getting cut off like someone was squizing it and my arm and fingers will go numb when I sleep but if i change positions it will go away but the part about going numb is not new, the rest is. The woman in my Dads family Have all died before the age of 55 from some sort of heart trouble along with diabetes. What do my sympoms sound like? what I cant figure out it comes and goes like contractions all day long.

question: Women’s Cardiovascular Health — Thursday, February 5, 2009, 12:00 p.m. — 1:00 p.m.(EST)Dr. Leslie Cho, a Cleveland cardiologist and Director of the Women’s Cardiovascular Center, will provide answers to your questions about prevention, treatment and what women should know when dealing with heart disease, during this free live web chat Thursday, February 5, 2009, 12:00 p.m. — 1:00 p.m.(EST). You may begin asking questions on Wednesday, 2/4.  They will be answered during the web chat on 2/5.http://www.clevelandclinic.org/webchat---------------MedHelp International
title: Free: Women's "Heart Health" Web Chat w/ Cleveland Clinic Cardiologist!
